article.contents:
# New Basics
Rolls: - Attack - Spellcraft - Concentration ?
Saves: - Fortitude - Reflex - Willpower
Defenses: - Armor - Dodge - Parry - Block
Other: - Initiative - Hit Points - Mana
These numbers are all determined by your class selection, and, secondarily, your ability scores.
Ability scores:
Strength | Dexterity | Constitution --------------------|------------------------|------------- +1 weapon damage | +1/2 to hit | +1 HP/lev +1 Parry | +1/4 crit range | +1 Fortitude | +1/2 to Dodge | +1 Block | +1/2 to Initiative |
Intelligence | Wisdom | Charisma --------------------|------------------------|------------- +1 to Spellcraft | +1 to Mana | +1 spell damage +1/4 crit range | +1 to Concentration | +1 Willpower
